title: "Windows 11 February Preview update adds feature to improve facial recognition"
excerpt: "A preview update for Windows 11 is now available that brings PCs to Build 22000.1641. The update adds an auto-learning feature to improve facial recognition and includes several other improvements. A similar update will ship next month on Patch Tuesday."
